const response = await client.search({
  index: "my-index",
  query: {
    multi_match: {
      fields: ["title", "content"],
      query: "the quick brown fox",
    },
  },
  rescore: {
    learning_to_rank: {
      model_id: "ltr-model",
      params: {
        query_text: "the quick brown fox",
      },
    },
    window_size: 100,
  },
});
console.log(response);
